title: Agent Hook (文档维护)
description: 定义修改代码时需同步维护的文档规则

options.label: API 变更同步
options.content:
### Documentation Sync
- **Trigger**: When modifying API endpoints (routes, models).
- **Action**: Update `{doc_path}` immediately.

options.label: 数据库变更同步
options.content:
### Documentation Sync
- **Trigger**: When modifying Database Schema (models, migrations).
- **Action**: Update `docs/schema.md` and ER Diagram.
